data.message: Agree! I love using Facebook and Messenger because I can keep in touch with my family and friends and it's really helpful for evryone specially your love ones and you DNT need to buy a load because the messenger you can use a call that's it  and your always updated of your family and friends and it's really easy to connect them everyday even your busy at work but they make your way easier to connect your love ones thank you guys and God blessed
